definition[0]: the study of human populations and the ways in which they change, for example the study of how many births, marriages and deaths happen in a particular place at a particular time
definition[1]: the study of human populations and the way in which they change
example[0]: economics, sociology, demography and other statistical social studies
definition[2]: the type of people that make up a particular population
example[1]: changes in the demography of British cities over the past two decades
